summary: "Quantum of Solace" is a 2008 spy movie, the 22nd in the James Bond series. It's a sequel to "Casino Royale" and stars Daniel Craig as Bond. In the film, Bond and Camille Montes (Olga Kurylenko) try to stop Dominic Greene (Mathieu Amalric) from taking over Bolivia for its natural resources. Filming took place in several countries and the movie was directed by Marc Forster. It made over $589 million worldwide. The next Bond film, "Skyfall," came out in 2012.
title: Quantum of Solace
